title: Vampire of Tehran
description:
Another Lossless extraction of a Muslimgauze classic. 
This time it is the Vampire of Tehran.
Tracks

Sikh Out  (10.29)
Arabs Improved Spain  (3.51)
Black Islamic Garb  (3.54)
North Afrika Is Not So Far Away  (3.27)
Enchante, Monsieur  (3.47)
The Fly That Constantly Bites  (1.05)
Strap Sticks Of Dynamite Around Her Body  (3.54)
Fez Tishan  (4.37)
Zuriff Moussa  (4.13)
Full Metal Yashmak  (6.03)
Hamas Pulse For Revenge  (3.14)
Dedicated to a just end.


The following is an explanation of the meaning of the title.

\"Gholamreza Kordieh was dubbed the \"Vampire of Tehran\" because he preyed on girls and women at night, while working as a taxi driver. He was flogged, then lashed by relatives of his nine victims, then hanged from a mobile crane to the chants of \"Allahu Akbar\"; a just end.\"
